actions.text: At the start of the level, the hints are invisible, so we set this variable to "False".
Reset the total length of the drawn line value.

children.text: We show hints on some levels.
We just enable the texture outline effect if there are no erasers.
We paste texture to the canvas and paste "eraser" objects to clear some areas, if "erasers" are on the screen.
To avoid creating too many links, check if the finger moved more than 27 px ("LinkWidth" variable value).
Hide a hint if it's active.

actions.text: Disable physical collisions with other links.

children.text: Create physical joints between links and the "PhysicalArea" sprite.
Allow drawing if no links were created.
Disable physical collisions with some objects.

events.title: Prevent drawing above the solid objects

children.text: We need this trigger to avoid drawing on physical objects.

actions.text: Enable "sine" behavior if the egg doesn't overlap the rope.
Pin the egg to the rope if they overlap and activate the "sine" behavior of the rope.
Enable "sine" behavior if the egg doesn't overlap the rope.
Pin the egg to the rope if they overlap and activate the "sine" behavior of the rope.

children.text: We create particles and play sounds.
Destroy the stick and rope if they are overlapping the egg.
Start the timer after creating links and finishing touching the screen.
Defeat happens if we don't break all the bad eggs within 5 seconds or if we accidentally break a good egg.
A victory check occurs every time we break a bad egg.
Only if we haven't exceeded the total number of levels.

actions.text: Wait and create UI for victory.

children.text: We go to a level if its value does not exceed the total number of levels.
Otherwise, we go to the random level.
Play the music if it wasn't enabled at the start.

actions.text: Make hint visible and start animation.

children.text: An exception for those cases when we don't need to draw, but only activate the wheel. You can see such an example at level 48.
Activate the pointer. The pointer is activated if we have viewed what the drawing should be, drawn a line, if the pointer is not active and if we don't touch the screen.

events.title: Special events to fix some levels

children.text: Changing the line's "Prevent rotation" setting at the 14th level.
Set default face at the first level.
Move the pencil to the "Objects" layer.
